DOC.brief_summary: This study research two question . First , vitamin D3 effective vitamin D2 raise 25-hydroxyvitamin D [ 25 ( OH ) D ] level chronic kidney disease ( CKD ) patient ? And secondly , differential effect vitamin D2 vitamin D3 mineral metabolism parameter ?
DOC.brief_title: Differential Effects Ergocalciferol Cholecalciferol Therapies Chronic Kidney Disease
DOC.detailed_description: Vitamin D help form strengthens bone allow body absorb calcium . Vitamin D help immune system fight infection well help keep muscle strong . Without enough vitamin D , bone become weak , thin brittle . Vitamin D useful people various type health issue . Patients CKD exhibit unusually high rate vitamin D deficiency , may contribute poor clinical outcome group . This study randomize patient CKD low vitamin D level two group ; one group treat vitamin D2 ( ergocalciferol ) group treat vitamin D3 ( cholecalciferol ) . The purpose study compare effect two different form vitamin D specifically patient chronic kidney disease .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 Chronic kidney disease estimate glomerular filtration rate ( GFR ) 1560 ml/min ( CKD stage IIIIV ) Vitamin D insufficiency ( 25hydroxyvitamin D level < 30 ng/mL ) treat vitamin D replacement since acquisition level Current treatment cholestyramine Presence GI disorder short bowel , history gastrectomy , colectomy , gastric bypass , inflammatory bowel disease , celiac disease , disorder fat absorption , chronic diarrhea . Liver cirrhosis Known current substance abuse Current treatment immunosuppressant medication Presence chronic infection History chronic inflammatory disease ( i.e . lupus , active rheumatoid arthritis , Crohns disease ) Currently receive highdose vitamin D replacement ( avg dose â‰¥ 3,000 U per day ) `` active '' vitamin D analogue ( e.g. , calcitriol , 1,25dihydroxyvitamin vitamin D ) .
